title: Sunset Arch Bouquet
short: A warm bouquet with sunset tones.
desc: This bouquet features orange roses, dried wheat, and eucalyptus for a boho-chic look.

title: Seaside Corsage
desc: Small corsage with sea-glass colors and minimal foliage, great for beach weddings.

title: Forest Please Boutonniere
desc: Rustic boutonniere using moss, fern and a single small rose.

title: Vintage Headpiece
desc: Handmade headpiece with pearl accents and brass filigree for a vintage look.

title: Boho Arch Garland
desc: Full garland mixing dried grasses, eucalyptus and pampas for a dramatic arch.

title: Petal Confetti Pack
desc: A pack of hand-dried petals in mixed colors—safe and compostable.
